name: ColorFold
summary:
ColorFold is a puzzle game that's all about folding and moving coloured ribbons - sounds easy, right? 
 
Move the ribbons in order to fill all checkpoints with the right color. Overlap ribbons, use barriers as a strategic advantage or use the mirrored ribbon, which copies your moves, to make it to the very end. Or use the new oneway-gates and tunnels to complete all levels. 
 
But I don't want to spoil it all - check it out for yourself, especially if you're into challenging puzzles! 
 
Features: 
 
- 150+ handcrafted, brainteasing levels 
 
- Beautiful dark mode 
 
- no ads 
 
- no microtransactions 
 
- universal app: buy once, play everywhere. 
 
Controls: 
 
- either use your mouse, the arrow keys or WASD to control the individual ribbons 
 
Happy folding!
